metadata.title: CVE-2020-22628 on Ubuntu 22.04 LTS (jammy) - medium
metadata.description:
Buffer Overflow vulnerability in LibRaw::stretch() function inlibraw\src\postprocessing\aspect_ratio.cpp.

    Update Instructions:

    Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2020-22628` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
    by updating your system to the following package versions:

libraw-bin - 0.20.2-2ubuntu2.22.04.1
libraw20 - 0.20.2-2ubuntu2.22.04.1
No subscription required

criterions.comment: libraw package in jammy, is related to the CVE in some way and has been fixed (note: '0.20.2-2ubuntu2.22.04.1').
darktable package in jammy is affected and may need fixing.
exactimage package in jammy is affected and may need fixing.
dcraw package in jammy is affected and may need fixing.
rawtherapee package in jammy is affected and may need fixing.
kodi package in jammy is affected and may need fixing.
digikam package in jammy is affected and may need fixing.
